You achieve a breakthrough in your exploration of magic. You gain [_humanoid form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=153) and [_mirror image_](/Spells.aspx?ID=197) as 2nd-level arcane innate spells. You can cast each of these arcane innate spells once per day.
